title: JIT IR protobuf serialization / deserialization
body_html:
This issue tracks the work on serialization and deserialization of the raw JIT IR via protobuf (using nanopb). One of the use cases is exporting the IR from PyTorch for use in a libtorch IR interpreter.

Things to do:

  • Define the proto model for the IR UPDATE: we're adopting the ONNX proto definitions
  • Implement the serialization pass (uses the ONNX export codepath)
  • Implement the deserialization pass

body:
This issue tracks the work on serialization and deserialization of the raw JIT IR via protobuf (using nanopb). One of the use cases is exporting the IR from PyTorch for use in a libtorch IR interpreter.

Things to do:
* [x] ~~Define the proto model for the IR~~ UPDATE: we're adopting the ONNX proto definitions
* [x] Implement the serialization pass (uses the ONNX export codepath)
* [x] Implement the deserialization pass
